page.title: 19MOTORWAY THOUGHTS (1)
page.content:
The Motorway is a fast dangerous place, destroying all in its path.Cutting through trees and fields to make more room, sticking its long, broad body where it pleases, with houses following close behind like servants of a King.The world is shrinking because of this grave giant.It runs in a straight line through the fields, through a forest of beautiful trees, straight to its destination.If someone's house is blocking the path it will kick them out and smash it to the ground.If a hill stands tall and firm it will dig its way through it.Yes, the world is shrinking because of this grave giant,the fast,dangerous motorway.
Written by Aarron Dean,aged 11,Deanwood Junior School,Gillingham. 10th July 1985
